item.description:
I would like to do more volunteer work but it never worked out with the demands of raising a toddler. But I finally found an opportunity!

The Humanist Chaplaincy at Harvard (HCH) has an interfaith community service initiative called Values in Action. They are packaging 40,000 meals in time for Thanksgiving. An incredible 10.8% of MA residents were food insecure in 2010! You can read more about HCH and this event here.

This is an all-ages event. I think Elsa (20mo) would have a great time putting different objects in boxes for packaging. The time is tricky because she's an afternoon napper, so we will aim for getting there later in the day.
item.name: Volunteering with the Family: Meal Packaging w/HCH
